overview:
## Return Value

An initialized web extension controller, or nil if the object could not be initialized.

## Discussion

This is a designated initializer. You can use [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtensionController/init()] to initialize an instance with the default configuration. The initializer copies the specified configuration, so mutating the configuration after invoking the initializer has no effect on the web extension controller.

# init(configuration:)

**Initializer**

Returns a web extension controller initialized with the specified configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(configuration: WKWebExtensionController.Configuration)
```

## Parameters

- **configuration**: The configuration for the new web extension controller.

## Return Value

An initialized web extension controller, or nil if the object could not be initialized.

## Discussion

This is a designated initializer. You can use [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtensionController/init()] to initialize an instance with the default configuration. The initializer copies the specified configuration, so mutating the configuration after invoking the initializer has no effect on the web extension controller.

## Related Documentation

- **init()**: Returns a web extension controller initialized with the default configuration.
